You will note that you are classed as an affiliate member. The association at Its last
convention in Minneapolis decided that now was the time to broaden its membership base.
Hence, it created a new type of membership known as affiliate.
By definition, active members own and operate their own stations. Associate members
regularly produce programs for use over stations they do not own. Affiliate members
neither am their own stations nor produce programs regularly but are interested in
educational broadcasting and wish to be kept informed of its progress.
Any one who is an affiliate member of this organisation and who at any time in the
future qualifies for either associate or active membership can automatically be put
in those classes merely by notifying the Executive Director.
Perhaps the greatest good of an MSB membership is the associations you fora. Itfs
